extendedInfo.description: Business Standard, Indiaâs leading business newspaper brings you top breaking stories in business, incisive analysis and insightful opinions. Besides news, you can also check out stock prices of Indiaâs leading companies. Catch all the business action as it happens through the day. Business Standard stands for reporting that stresses accuracy and credibility, comment that is informed, independent and fair, and journalism that is rooted in ethical conduct and defined by a sacrosanct bond with the reader. Features â¢ Top stories on business in India â¢ Breaking news â¢ Articles from the newspaper â¢ Special features on developing stories â¢ Analysis and opinion by specialist contributors including some of the sharpest minds writing on economics and   businessâ¢ Regular stock market updates â¢ Stock price data and charts on Indiaâs top companies â¢ News on companies, economy, finance, management, technology â¢ Video updates on markets and top business events of the day â¢ Share articles by email and social media websitesPlease send us feedback and suggestion to feedback@business-standard.com For more news, visit www.business-standard.com

reviews.title: Adds
reviews.comment: The apps is good but remove the ads as it just looks worst . The size of screen reduces much that now I feel to go for another app as the adds are very annoying.. It would be five star if adds are removed.
reviews.author: Niyam Vora

reviews.title: Needs Improvement
reviews.comment: It lacks some basic features, like there is no zoom in and zoom out option (increase/decrease in text suze). In sharing, there are only 3 options, there is no provision for sharing the article via diff. applications like messaging, whatsapp,  notes, pocket, etc..so that i can share an article with someone or save it for later. All these features are available in other apps, like BBC News and TOI.
reviews.author: Lokesh Mittal

reviews.title: Need more updation
reviews.comment: Good effort by BS but need features such as dark theme, font size, share to other apps like whatsapp n pocket n lot more to make this app better...
reviews.author: CHIRAG SALLA

reviews.title: Great tool on the move...
reviews.comment: Great tool for business news on the move
reviews.author: Dharmender Khajuria

reviews.title: Good for seeking pulse of indian economy
reviews.author: vijay kumar jaiswal

reviews.title: Less area to read news
reviews.comment: Top and bottom areas are filled with shortcuts whereas only less area available to read. Full screen mode to read is not available.  So only 3 stars.
reviews.author: Gowri Sankar

reviews.title: Opinion is not updating frm last 6 days
reviews.comment: Dear team please resolve the issue of opinion option which is not being updated frm last 6 days.
reviews.author: jitesh rajput

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Good apps for regular stock market update
reviews.author: Hemkant Mahajan

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Awesome application..easy to access... Market updates evry day...good work...
reviews.author: Salim Baig

reviews.title: Can be improved a lot more
reviews.comment: I\'m a great fan of BS since really long. This app is a very good substitute to the paper, but it needs to be little quicker
reviews.author: Anurag Jain

reviews.title: Must for business/finance news lovers
reviews.comment: Awesome app with great stories in easy to use interface.
reviews.author: Nikhil Suri

reviews.comment: Very Elementary; in early stages, needs imprvmnt
